query:
SELECT 'Pacientes Ativos' as metrica, COUNT(*) as valor FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Atendimentos Total', COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Atendimentos 2025', COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND YEAR(data_atendimento) = 2025
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Atendimentos 2026', COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND YEAR(data_atendimento) = 2026
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Convênios Únicos', COUNT(DISTINCT convenio) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Diagnósticos Únicos', COUNT(DISTINCT grupo_diagnostico) FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND grupo_diagnostico IS NOT NULL;
